description: The river is a good skate ski from LaBarriere Park to Kingswood Golf Course. The river winds through the Red River Valley and is full of wild life. You will almost always see deer and owls. There are coyotes, bobcats and bald eagles in the area as well. You can ski one way by having tranportation at each end or do a return trip.
directions: Start at thde parking lot in LaBarriere Park and end at the footbridge at Kingwood Golf Course.
title: LaSalle River
